projects.title: Validating a novel tablet-based speech app in amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS)
projects.description: As part of a Mitacs Elevate fellowship, collaborated with Winterlight Labs to analytically and clincially validate (Goldsack V3 framework) their speech assessment technology in a cohort of ALS patients.

projects.title: Developing a novel, multimodal speech assessment web app
projects.description: Led design, testing, and analytical module development for a web-based assessment of speech that is designed to detect and track neurological diseases by measuring speech.

projects.title: Improving automatic speech recognition (ASR) for detection of dysarthria (MSc project)
projects.description: Oversaw a master's degree project in the department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at the University of Toronto. Project was focused on characterizing the performance of various ASR methods as a function of dysarthria severity, and improving their performance using transfer learning.
